plot: Minutes before their wedding, Sarah the Bride and Blair her Maid of Honor - and Paul the Groom, and Charlie his Best Man have two very different conversations.
title: Something Borrowed, Something Blew...
plot_es: Minutes before their wedding, Sarah the Bride and Blair her Maid of Honor - and Paul the Groom, and Charlie his Best Man have two very different conversations.
plot_en: Minutes before their wedding, Sarah the Bride and Blair her Maid of Honor - and Paul the Groom, and Charlie his Best Man have two very different conversations.
